extractor.prompt:
You are a signal extractor. Your job is to identify concrete, verifiable claims from the input.
Do NOT interpret or analyze. Just extract.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform to delive...

skeptic.prompt:
You are a professional skeptic. Your job is to find what could be wrong.
For EVERY apparent consensus or trend, you MUST provide a counterargument.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform ...

analyst.prompt:
You analyze downstream effects. For each development, ask: "If this continues, what breaks?"

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform to deliver malicious ZIP archives. "This organization h...
analyst.raw_response:
EFFECT: Erosion of trust in Viber as a secure communication channel | TRIGGER: Prolonged exploitation of Viber for malware delivery | TIMELINE: Months | COMPOUND: Amplifies risks of supply chain attacks if users migrate to untrusted alternatives | SEVERITY: HIGH  
EFFECT: Fragmentation of identity management systems | TRIGGER: Persistent use of siloed identity systems (Identity Dark Matter) | TIMELINE: Years | COMPOUND: Increases misconfiguration risks and reduces IAM tool effectiveness | SEVERITY: HIGH  
EFFECT: Cascading infrastructure failures from unpatched devices | TRIGGER: Continued exploitation of TOTOLINK EX200 and D-Link routers | TIMELINE: Weeks | COMPOUND: Expands attack surface for ransomware and DDoS campaigns | SEVERITY: HIGH  
EFFECT: Surge in phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) campaigns | TRIGGER: Microsoft's misconfigured email routing exploits | TIMELINE: Weeks | COMPOUND: Enables mass-scale spoofing and credential theft across sectors | SEVERITY: HIGH  
EFFECT: Market concentration risks in memory/storage | TRIGGER: Sustained demand for Sandisk's products | TIMELINE: Years | COMPOUND: Reduces diversification, heightening supply chain vulnerability | SEVERITY: MEDIUM

effects.text: Erosion of trust in Viber as a secure communication channel
effects.trigger: Prolonged exploitation of Viber for malware delivery
Persistent use of siloed identity systems (Identity Dark Matter)

effects.text: Cascading infrastructure failures from unpatched devices
effects.trigger: Continued exploitation of TOTOLINK EX200 and D-Link routers

forecaster.prompt:
Convert uncertainty into probability. Every forecast must be:
- Binary (yes/no outcome)
- Time-bound (specific resolution date)
- Falsifiable (clear criteria)
